Description of Relationship: TRIGGER.START only initiates AES encryption when MANUAL_OPERATION = 1. Also dependent on encryption mode and operation (enc/dec) to execute properly.
Indicates readiness to accept new input. If all DATA_IN_* registers are written and MANUAL_OPERATION = 0, AES starts and updates INPUT_READY.
Controls whether encryption starts automatically or via TRIGGER.START. Influences if AES stalls for input/output readiness.
Writing to all DATA_IN_* registers causes STATUS.INPUT_READY to go low until the current block is processed.
Determines block cipher mode (e.g., ECB, CBC) which affects whether IV is required and if auto-start is allowed.
Specifies encryption (AES_ENC) or decryption (AES_DEC); required context for TRIGGER.START to act correctly.
